title: Order Food at a Restaurant
description: Practice ordering food at a restaurant.
initial_prompt: You are at a restaurant. The waiter asks: 'What would you like to eat?'

title: Visit a Doctor
initial_prompt: You are visiting a doctor. The doctor says: 'What brings you in today?'

title: Booking a Hotel Room
description: Simulate booking a hotel room at a front desk.
initial_prompt: You are at a hotel reception. The receptionist says: 'Welcome! How can I help you today?'

title: Buying Tickets at a Train Station
description: Practice buying tickets and asking about train schedules.
initial_prompt: You are at a train station. The clerk asks: 'Where are you traveling to?'

title: Calling Customer Support
description: Simulate a call with customer support to report an issue.
initial_prompt: You are calling customer support. The agent says: 'Thank you for calling. How can I assist you today?'
